name: ATNRPG
description:
Welcome to ATNRPG. In this game, you play as a young man who's traveling the fantasy land that was his creation. Along the way you meet monsters and people. Some good, some bad. Meanwhile trying to stop two horrible Deities who have total control over the world!

However, things are bound to go wrong when you can influence things greatly while in an unstable condition.

Explore the Vast Open World, defeat horrible beasts that lurk the dungeons, and discover more about these characters and their moral values. Most importantly...
Have fun, and Stay Lucid.
